name: ARCANIUM: Rise of Akhan
storyline:
ARCANIUM: Rise of Akhan is an ambitious Open-world, Single-player Strategy Card game of epic proportions, that merges the "Roguelike" & "Deckbuilding" genres in many new ways. Arcanium is a tale of fellowship and bravery and is set in a fantasy world of anthropomorphic animals in which good, evil, magic and technology collide.

Form a party of three Heroes and embark on a dangerous journey in order to defeat Akhan the Calamity, and save the World of Arzu from destruction. But beware, should one of your party members succumb to corruption, your quest has come to its end!
summary: Arcanium is an ambitious Open-world, Single-player Strategy Card Adventure that merges “Roguelike” & “Deckbuilding” genres in many new & exciting ways. Control a party of three Heroes on their treacherous journey to save the world of Arzu from destruction.
